name: J C Brennan Consultancy Ltd
goal:
I am a freelance consultant with some 40 years of experience in electrical engineering. I have worked in projects for electricity supply companies in many countries worldwide as well as railway transportation and industrial/military complexes.

My experience and specialities include:

Power System Operation - emphasis on control, monitoring and management of networks, Related Grid Codes

Organisation of electricity company operational functions

Project evaluation

Management of multidiscipline projects

My goal is to provide consultancy services of the nature described above primarily to electricity supply companies, funding agencies and other consultancy companies.
